name: Goldfishin
description:
Created for :   Mini Jam 85: Gold.

Use arrow keys    or WASD to control your boat.  In 60 seconds make sure you are on top  of a fish, that is when the fishing rods will reel in.  Win the game by discovering a Goldfish or  earning 1000 points by catching other fish.

In hard mode you are able to stop your boat by anchoring. Otherwise ignore the anchor icon in the bottom right of the screen when in easy mode.
